item.title: Large caravan, 26th August
item.description:
A very large caravan has been parked half on the road half on the pavement outside 36 Longbury drive and has been there over a month it was originally parked on Wateringbury close for around 3 weeks before, the male that keeps going into it also has 3 other vehicles 1 being a very large box style van, he takes up around 4/5 parking spaces, the VRN on the caravan also belongs to a white Vauxhall

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Longbury Drive, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kempe road - near Kensal rise school, 26th August
item.description:
There is a whole heap of rubbish from the carnival. It does not look good. Shouldnâ€™t wake up on Tuesday and still see the mess. Brent council do better
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kempe Road, London
